review_body: App needs so much work The service itself is great.  All of my complaints are with the app and not Pandora itself.

Pandora‚Äô Disclaimer Allow me start off with how much I utilize Pandora. I have had a Pandora account for at least 8 years. But recently I have purchased the Pandora Premium account. I loved the idea of downloading music to listen to later and I have my own personal music list. I loved the idea of the ‚ÄúOffline‚Äù feature as well. But recently I have ran into a few issues. 1 of them being when I switch the offline due to being in an airplane... it only allows me to listen to SOME of the songs even though I have downloaded them. When I go to click on the song it states that it is not allowed for playbacks. üßê Sooooo... why was able to download it if I can‚Äôt replay it?? 2. Then I was listening to my songs with WiFi and it was telling me that I can‚Äôt listen to the songs because they are not allowed for playbacks... so no matter what.... you allowed me to feel like I was given the opportunity to have the song on my playlist BUT I can‚Äôt listen to it?? 3. You are able to listen to a lot of songs. You can search for a lot of songs. You can discover new songs.... but you can NOT download a lot of these songs... so my conclusion is... deal with the lack of skips, commercials and keep the free option because it‚Äôs not worth what they charge. Very disappointing.

Two stars for what Pandora once was... I‚Äôve been a fairly long time user of Pandora One. The poor performance of this app is almost making me consider leaving them for online radio. First and foremost, here recently the app has been real garbage. Every time I open it it‚Äôs either wanting me to sign into Facebook, or sign up for the higher Pandora service. To me that‚Äôs a bit insulting as a person that already pays for Pandora One. There aren‚Äôt supposed to be ads, and I certainly don‚Äôt want to sign into Facebook on Pandora. Here recently it‚Äôs been terrible about audio playback too. For example, the other day if I‚Äôd switch to another app or if my phone would go to sleep Pandora would quit playing music. An uninstall and reinstall of the app did fix this. Another issue I‚Äôve been having is sometime I‚Äôll get a notification from another app, the music volume turns down for said notification, but then it doesn‚Äôt turn the music back up after, making me close the app and reopen it. One other complaint I have is if I pause the music, the app sometimes just plain seems to forget once I hit play if I spent too long on pause. In order to get music to play again I have to go and reopen the Pandora app. Often times whatever song I was enjoying is no longer there. Really discontent with the quality here recently.

Ads, ads, and then more ads Too many ads of course. I spend 1 minute (two 30 second ads) listening to your ads, ok great. Then a song comes on that I don‚Äôt like, press skip, instantly 2 more adds. So now 2 minutes have passed and I‚Äôm still stuck with listening to the SAME ads over and over and over again. The ad frequency is way too high compared to any other free radio out there. Plus, the music that does get to play isn‚Äôt even what I like to listen to. And a lot of time the music isn‚Äôt even tailored to the station. And then there‚Äôs the issue where after 8-10 songs, it literally LOOPS!!! It will the start playing the same songs you listened to an hour ago, or where you last listened to Pandora. Pandora is the WORST out there. Compare that to iHeartRadio who has a way better tailored music experience and less ads that are actually relevant to me. On top of that, the only benefits you receive after paying monthly for their premium is just ‚Äúmore skips‚Äù and ‚Äúless ads‚Äù. There are definitely way better services out there that when you pay you get ‚Äúno ads‚Äù and ‚Äúunlimited skips‚Äù. Pandora is just a major waste of time, they‚Äôre only in it for the money and because of that they‚Äôll eventually die off as someone else overtakes them; unless they radically change their business model and put the user listening experience in the spotlight.

I love this app I don‚Äôt have the premium plan but nevertheless I would definitely vouch for this app. I recommend this to anyone who wants to jam to their music even with the slight interruption of random catchy ads that you‚Äôd surprisingly enjoy. The only thing I can think of that would make one confused or upset is the replay button when you specifically request a song in exchange of a few seconds of advertisement. The replay button within itself does its job; replays continuously until your time is up. On the other hand, when you tap that button twice, to request the song to repeat only once it doesn‚Äôt do so. It would replay the song continuously until time is up, which normally doesn‚Äôt happen tho because you‚Äôd realize it continued more times than wanted. But that can always be fixed, simply by stopping it from replaying by tapping the replay button once more to allow it to go on auto play immediately after or even just requesting another song üòÖ

Nothing compared to Apple Music There are a lot of adds on Pandora and after paying the smaller subscription (something like $5 a month), I found that I was still limited in what I could do. I was not able to make or edit playlists nearly as well as Apple Music if at all (I never figured it out), the amount of likes and dislikes was also limited. There came several times when I noticed an apparent glitch in the system as well. There was a type of song that continued to play on a certain violin station (Daniel D) that sounded almost like a metronome. I pushed dislike. But then, as if I actually pushed ‚Äúlike‚Äù, it played another similar song. Before I knew it, I was listening to nothing but that type of music and patiently disliking every last one. Then I ran out of dislikes. I have noticed that a lot of stations are seemingly preset mostly by popular trends. My likes and dislikes don‚Äôt have as strong an influence as they should.

Tricking people into buying the app... disgraceful I am a long time Pandora listener. Decent streams of all sorts of genres of music but a lot of replay in a short period of time which is bad/good for some so I‚Äôm not judging on that.  I would happily pay a fair price for their service ($2.99/month).  I feel they are greedy and not in touch with the reality of the situation, the fact that the internet is saturated with online music provides many of which are free.  But the reason I will never buy service from Pandora is because they purposefully try to trick you almost every time you click on the app by moving the ‚Äúpurchase‚Äù button at the precise time the average user goes to click on ‚Äúnot now‚Äù.  They have spent way to much time and energy trying to trick users into buying their service when a few days of honest assessing of the current competitor market would yield a fair but lower subscription price.  This would in turn give them a larger subscription base and in the end more revenue.  Please don‚Äôt do business with a company that practices borderline unethical business practices, if they are willing to do this everyday in front of our faces what else would they do to keep you locked in as a subscriber?  Come on Pandora, is this really the relationship you want with your customers?

I want an improved music service This is Pandora‚Äôs last week to prove that it‚Äôs the music service for me.  I drive a lot between major cities and service drops all the time.  Even when i have good service the app locks up and makes me reboot.  Lastly, it‚Äôs not clear what or how im paying for plus.  I guit once because of the ridiculous monthly tap when all i wanted to do was pay for a year and forget about the hassle  of remembering to deduct monthly payments.  Now, i cant see (on the app) how I‚Äôm paying, again.  Ill logon to the website and find out if I‚Äôll just quit then and there.  Apple music had been sending little treats and Pandora hasn‚Äôt been concerned enough to make the app work through my iphone ( so far) and without a pretty rapid service improvement ( i just updated the app) and a means to see how I‚Äôm paying for plus from my very secure phone, i will quit and move on.  I have to add one more, i was engaged many years ago by a stellar customer service representative.  She was so helpful that i nearly stayed on, in spite of the required monthly payments option at the time.  When Pandora finally adopted the annual payment option again, I don‚Äôt return. But now service is suffering.  Please make this right.  Thank you very much for reading my novella! üòÅ

Pandora Plus...has its flaws. First of all, with Plus you‚Äôre supposed to have the ability to listen to a few offline stations. In theory, it‚Äôs supposed to switch to offline mode automatically when you lose cell service or internet access...rarely ever does this happen automatically. Also, of the 4 available offline stations, usually only 1 works. At least a third of the time it will say all stations are unavailable and will play nothing. My second complaint is something that annoys me so much, I‚Äôve been looking into other music services. Even though I pay for ad free and already have Pandora Plus, ads for Pandora Plus pop up constantly! Initially premium ads were coming up, and that‚Äôs annoying enough, but then to keep pushing Plus on me when I ALREADY HAVE IT is just too much for me.

Can‚Äôt get it right AGAIN!!! Once‚Äôs again you mess up the app. Now I can‚Äôt get it to work. When I turn it on the app then   when I closed the screen to let it play in back ground. It turns off the music. Then when I try to put it back on it freezes. I have to turn off the app then turn it back on. This happens every time. Now that I paid for this service it not working. This happen 1 day after the last fix. Plus you can‚Äôt see whats playing in the lock screen. Just shows the pandora app is on. GREAT JOBS!!! (Not)

Really like Pandora despite its issues I really like Pandora. They fixed the latest crashing issue. I occasionally use and try other apps. Some are good for specific uses, like just finding a specific song or hearing what friends like. But Pandora consistently curated music very very well and I keep coming back, now defaulting to it for general listening in the car and at home. Jazz, electronica, fusion, trance, house, and artist or even song-based stations - you name it: I get an excellent mix suited to my tastes, with new tunes and artists I hadn‚Äôt yet heard. Yes, their ad behavior is irritating in the free version. But if you grew up listening to AM radio as I did, this is not really a problem. And if you can‚Äôt stand it, ante-up for the premium version. It is totally worth it if you hate the ads that much what with all the extra features you get. Keep it up Pandora. Just don‚Äôt make your ad function any more annoying than it already is (like popping up  more ads when I just want to see the album cover, making me click two or three times to see it!). If you make it less annoying I‚Äôll give you a full five stars!

Done with this app This app seems to have a new unfixable bug where when I connect to my car (wired or Bluetoot) the skip doesn‚Äôt work. I press once on my wheel to skip, and pandora app skips 1-3 songs, effectively using all my free skips. Wrote to help desk telling them I tried resetting, reinstalling, updating the app, and restarting my phone. And what do they say? They completely ignore what I wrote and tell me to do exactly what I just said I did. It‚Äôs like they didn‚Äôt even read what I wrote. They literally advised me to do everything I said I did.

Love you, but there‚Äôs one problem I've been using Pandora for years and I love it. Yeah, they have some bugs, but a lot of apps do. Some of my now favorite bands I found from pandora. I pay $5/month for the premium version and it‚Äôs really worth it. My only complaint, which is more of a suggestion or request, I wish I could choose which stations I had offline. I have stations that I‚Äôve listened to so freaking much, that‚Äôs how the app decides which stations are available offline, but I don‚Äôt want those for offline use. The fact that the more you listen to offline ones, the more hours you accumulate, solidifying their spots on the list. I frequently find myself with little to no data connection, so I really appreciate and rely on the offline mode. I tried deleting those stations and re-loading my offline stations, but alas it did not fix the problem... it honestly just made it worse. I deleted all of my stations that hadn‚Äôt been listened to this year and I‚Äôm realizing that to get the stations I want offline, I‚Äôll have to delete all of them but the ones I want. So if you could choose the stations to download, that‚Äôd be dope and then I‚Äôd definitely give you a well-deserved 5 stars üò¨

Not a good algorhythm The problems I have with Pandora are that I type in a group or a song name I want to hear and maybe I‚Äôll hear one song by that group and then many, many songs by all types of other bands, many of which I give a ‚Äúthumbs down‚Äù but they still cycle around. Sometimes I‚Äôll dislike a group and then Pandora will send 2 or 3 more songs by that group, when I HATE that group, but no songs of the group I want to hear.

Organization Hi. First if all, I would like to thank you for reading this request. Now I will get on with it. I really like Pandora, but I think that you should make it more organized. I think that the favorites should be on the top of all of the stations. I also think that to make it more attractive, the blue bar at the bottom of the screen should be either white, black, or non-existent. It‚Äôs just not attractive, and all of my friends and family agree. I‚Äôm sorry if you feel as if I am taking over your business, but that is just the way that the people want it. Only the album covers should be full with color. Everything else, I feel, should be black and white and grey. More modern = more attractive. Sorry, but it‚Äôs just what it is. My friends and I would also like if everytime we opened the app, music would not automatically start playing. I hope that you can find the time to make the changes in the next two weeks, or I will definitely be compelled to delete the app. I really do think that this app is a very good app and would like to give you props for making it. But the main point of this review is to tell you that the visual appearance of this app is just not attractive. Thank you for reading. Goodbye.

It could be better I have the premium subscription and overall I‚Äôm pleased with the easy to use platform, music selection and the quality of sound. However I do agree with other users that I wish Pandora would give users (especially those that pay for premium) the ability to edit/sort your stations and playlists on your home page. Yes you can filter for your stations or downloaded playlists but I‚Äôm pretty particular and I like things to be alphabetical... or the order in which my brain thinks is most logical. But the thing that bothers me THE MOST is the fact that when you pause a song, and lock your phone and walk away for a moment or pause to have a conversation with a coworker and you go back to the app, it acts like you just opened the app and the song you were listening to you, at your favorite part, starts over. What‚Äôs with that?! I understand that music apps may be different but the free game apps I have don‚Äôt wipe out my progress if I pause the game and ‚Äúminimize‚Äù the app.... why can‚Äôt the app I pay monthly for do the same?!?

Thumbprint Overrides Selection When I choose an Artist to listen to, I expect the majority of the music for that channel to be the Artist I selected, not just a few. It seems the more thumbprints your choose, the less of the actual artist you want to listen to actually get played.  Recently is seems to be maybe 10-15% of the actual artist/musicians channel that is chosen actually gets their music.  The only way I can see to fix the issue is to ‚ÄúUn-THUMBPRINT‚Äù the individual channels other artist/musician thumbprints to be able to listen to that channels music.  The thumbprints should only be used as a guide for using the thumbprint channel itself, or to fill in an occasional selection.  There should be no more than 25% of the thumbprint selections on an an individual / group artist / musicians channel except for thumbprint or various selection channels.  Perhaps if people prefer thumbprints over the actual artist /musician selected, a setup panel for individuals to choose how much thumbprint they want to listen to Vs actual artist / musician channel would be appropriate.

It‚Äôs alright... It‚Äôs a good music app and all but it has its flaws.  For starters I‚Äôm tired of when it switches to autoplay from my playlist it‚Äôs usually the same songs in the same order...that‚Äôs not auto play.  Switch it up man.  I hate how when I am in auto play and I stop the app, not close it but stop it, and I go back into it it starts from my most recently played playlist....WHY???  I suggest making it easier to delete playlists or songs in the playlist without having to go into my profile and search around for eternity.  Every playlist should have a delete option and every song in that playlist should have a swipe left to remove from playlist option.  Another thing is I swear when I do delete a playlist or a song in the playlist it‚Äôs gone from my library....every song in that playlist will just poof....disappear.  Finally when it comes to making a playlist, give the name it option like you do but give a plus icon so you can browse every song in your library with an add option instead of having to click every song individually, then the three dots, then add to playlist, then which playlist you want it in....simplify man come on!

Why I love Pandora. Omg, Pandora is simply the BEST!! It‚Äôs a place where you can find all of you favorite songs for free! I LOVE MUSIC! And if you love music as much as I do, then your going to LOVE Pandora. I love it so much that I listen to it in bed! üòÇ But... the only thing I wish was different about Pandora, is that I really wish there were more songs that have a clean version. Sometimes, when I start listening to a song, I search for a clean version of it just in case. Let‚Äôs say I wanted to listen to ‚ÄúOn My Way‚Äù By Alan Walker & Sabrina Carpenter, then I would normally search for a clean version of that song. But sometimes, I click the normal version of it because I would think it didn‚Äôt have bad words in it due to the fact that it didn‚Äôt have a clean version. But then... I get startled by the cuss words. And then, just because of that, I tend to dislike the song. So whenever I hear that song on a different station, I will most likely üëéüèº the song. I love you Pandora, but please please work on those clean versions!! I really enjoy your music, I can‚Äôt wait to see what you do next!

Rather lacking... I do love Pandora, and I use this app all the time, but certain features never work on my phone; for example, the friend search, and Facebook linking. I tried those on my husband‚Äôs Samsung phone, and they work, but not on my iPhone for some reason. Deleting and reinstalling doesn‚Äôt help.

Slimy sales tricks. Classless. Barely able to navigate app due to the overwhelming number of adds that they jam down your throat. Back to back Pop ups that require you to close, lazily slopped together commercials, and if that wasn't enough the variety of songs is  pitiful. After the first 7 songs it just goes to a loop where I hear the same familiar songs day in and out. For how little this app provides it's not worth sitting through horrible repetitive commercials and closing swarms of pop up ads. Goodbye pandora.

Pandora Premium may not be so great after all My headphone controls are not working with Pandora anymore over the last few days and Pandora no longer comes up on my lock screen. This is absolutely irritating. Who do I need to complain to in order to get this fixed?!

Love, Music and Pandora For people who truly love music Pandora is a godsend. There is a joy that That comes from a good surprise. With Pandora you don‚Äôt have to set up a playlist, so you‚Äôre never sure what song my play next. Pandora uses a song or band that you chose to start your station. They play music that is similar to your original chose. Pandora then uses algorithms that track your likes and dislikes of the songs that you have listened to in order to create a custom playlist for every user. I pay for the service that removes the ads and allows me to skip any songs or repeat any songs that I want.I have had Pandora for years and enjoy it so much that I stopped to write this small review. If you love music I think that you will also love Pandora. I hope that you give it a try. Music brings so much happiness to life, and with Pandora your music can always be with you. I don‚Äôt have to download hundreds of songs I can just listen to my music every were I go. I love music. I love Pandora.

Downloaded songs not really accessible I like pandora but recently when I select shuffle my thumbs up it repeats the same several songs (songs I have given the thumbs up) along with new songs in the same vein. The new stuff is ok but why keep repeating the one or two songs over and over from my list of 302 songs. My other issue is I live in an area where reception comes and goes between my commute to and from work...so I downloaded quite a few songs. I wish I could select offline mode but I can‚Äôt. So I will be rocking out and when the song comes to an end I have sudden total silence while it connects ‚Äúbuffers‚Äù for the next 10 minutes. Instead of just going into off line mode and playing my downloads. So my question are they truly downloaded? Why else would the app keep searching ‚Äúbuffering‚Äù. If you live in a non rural area I am sure you don‚Äôt even notice but us Northern California coastal towns do! I end up switching to google play. As I want to rock out before I have a hectic day working at the local hospital or going home to take care of my three awesome teenagers and hubby!

Amazing! And I have a lot of proof for it too! I love this app! It‚Äôs great for listening to your favorite music! It doesn‚Äôt turn off in other apps, on your home screen, and when you turn your device off. I‚Äôve used some other music apps and this one is by far my favorite, in fact I‚Äôm listening right now. However, they do send a lot of emails. I‚Äôm okay with them but if you don‚Äôt like them you can easily unsubscribe from the emails and still listen to the music. Also there are a ton of different kinds of music and whatever you like is probably there. They also personalize it to you and it‚Äôs great. If you don‚Äôt like their suggestions you can always search up something you would like to listen to and you‚Äôll probably find it. I am constantly on there listening to music and thumbing up all of the songs. You can thumbs up or thumbs down songs depending on how you like them. You can listen to all of your radios together or you can listen to your favorite songs on the thumbprint radio.

Unfair! I‚Äôm outraged!! I am taking my business elsewhere. They don‚Äôt have a number you can call if you have a quick question and they drag to respond. I sighed up for the premium family plan and I was actually kinda excited about it. I had it for 3 months and had my sister and parents on it. Just two days ago they didn‚Äôt take the money and pandora asked me if I wanted to subscribe to one of their plans. I thought there must have been a problem with the card I have since it‚Äôs been acting up. I went to where you sign up to the pandora family plan and it asked for my log in information. I logged in and it said ‚ÄúUnable to subscribe to Pandora Premium Family

Has something changed with the Pandora app??? Ive had Pandora for several years now, it is the free version. I have not been able to listen to my Pandora for over a week now. When I click into one of my stations, it doesn‚Äôt play. I can‚Äôt even click play, rewind, or fast forward. The icons are there but not highlighted. I have logged in and out. I‚Äôve turned on/off my phone and I‚Äôve even deleted and reinstalled the app. I‚Äôve done this multiple times and still nothing. When I exit out of the station to browse for other options, it says buffering...your station will be right back. I logged out of my account and had my son log into his account on my phone and his account works on my phone.  I contacted the help support explaining all of this, and they sent me the troubleshooting information from their website after I explained I‚Äôve already done all of the troubleshooting. The email they sent me said, if I was still having trouble, to respond to their email, which I did , and I still have not heard anything back. Horrible, horrible customer support.

No radio zone. I put off moving from Fl to the backwoods of western North Carolina mostly because there was only talk radio and two country stations (I don‚Äôt like country at all) but as fait has it, I moved up here anyway in ‚Äò07 & lived in misery until my first smart phone & finding the Pandora app in around ‚Äò14 & found again what living was again. Than in mid 2017 I was working at a house in the middle of nowhere for weeks on end. I got no service out there & the free Pandora didn‚Äôt work out of coarse too. At this point I decided to brake down & get Pandora premium for off line playlist. I have had Pandora premium since that time and have never looked back. I love it, it is my personal radio station. Like I own my own station & can play whatever the hell I want. A few things pop up (can‚Äôt play due to licensing) but it‚Äôs rare enough & it usually doesn‚Äôt last long. Dollar for $ it is the best app I have for sure. I literally have it on 12 plus hours a day. From Hannibal Burris to Bradley‚Äôs Postmodern jukebox & 99.9% of anything in between.

This is an annoying bug that needs to be fixed First off, I am only fourteen years old and I don‚Äôt have a bank account yet and I love the little sessions you get so you can listen to specific songs but there is something really annoying I don‚Äôt even know if it‚Äôs just my phone or if it is pandora but I hope this sounds familiar. So I go on the half session (I watch an ad first üôÇ) So anyway the ad ends and it turns on my favorite song! I listen to it a few times ü•∞ but then it will happen: I try to go back to my favorite part let‚Äôs say üòê then this happens... IT WON‚ÄôT PLAY!!!! It has this thing where the time (The end) is not there and I have to swipe with my thumb the thing on the song time back and it just won‚Äôt do anything I press replay many times STILL WONT PLAY!!!! So then I have to get off pandora and play a game or something ‚Äòtill the session ends!! Or I have to re-login to my account! I tried restarting my phone a few times in fact! I go on Pandora THE SESSION IS STILL ON BUT IT WON‚ÄôT PLAY?!!!? üò± This is my bug experience with Pandora! Thank u! Anyways Pandora is a great app! Thank you. ü§ó

Best thing Ive had Pandora for YEARS.  I finally upgraded to a paid account instead of free.  I wish i had done this years ago.  I have always loved pandora and have found so many of my favorite bands through Pandora.  Now i used Pandora as a ‚Äútherapy‚Äù or ‚Äúmedication‚Äù. Im a combat vet with serious PTSD and until very recently have been able to go without any pills due mostly to Pandora.  I know that sounds silly but I legitimately medicate with music (specifically Pandora).  I use special stations ive set up when i paint as well for inspiration and to keep the right mood or frame of mind or energy for the style im working on that night.  Pandora has been and is currently a godsend for me and theres a decent chance I wouldn‚Äôt be here without it.  Im a lifetime customer and incredibly appreciative of all the free years i accessed it as well.  I hope someone up top reads this review because i want to thank you from the bottom of my heart for what you have no idea you‚Äôve done in my life.  Tearing up as I write this lol...THANK YOU.

Why I love this app I love this app because I can have songs when I have my phone off so it will be able to not die when I don‚Äôt have a charger and I can play other games while I‚Äôm listening to music music which is amazing I love your guises game will app Pandora is the best app I‚Äôve used and I hope everyone gave you five or four stars not three are down I don‚Äôt think you guys deserve 32 or a one star I think you guys deserve five or for at least four but I say five I like how you guys can do an interview I likeI like how you can change times and you want to have different thumbs up thumbs down I don‚Äôt really like the ad but that‚Äôs OK you don‚Äôt really have ads and I like how you can just search Music or little search I like how you can change sounds and you want to have different thumbs up thumbs down I don‚Äôt really like the ad but that‚Äôs OK you don‚Äôt really have ads and I like how you can search Music or a little search you know I mean and I really like it I‚Äôm glad I can tell you guys this

Newest format is a let down. I have been a paid customer for three years and have used Pandora for long since I chose to pay for it. The ads never bothered me even as the frequency increased, but I paid for the service because I liked the random music sequence. A few years ago I‚Äôd select or make a radio station and then keep editing it. A song might become too repetitive so I‚Äôd just mark ‚ÄúI‚Äôm tired of this song‚Äù and my station would start playing different music. I was able to get my stations tailor made to my liking through this setting, but since the beginning to mid 2017 I had this feature disappear on my iPhone. No problem, it was a annoying, but I‚Äôd just use my iPad. Yet, it seems that I the past few updates the format has been changed on the iPad too to get rid of this feature. In one of those updates some of my channels were deleted and I can‚Äôt find them on the browse genre option anymore. Also, without the option to place a track on temporary hold, I have to down thumb it, and the the song is lost forever on the station.

Great Disappointment I was really loving pandora. Playing music I knew and finding new music to love and then after a few weeks it started crashing. I followed the support directions: stop and close app, reopen: same error. Turn off device, turn back on: same error. Delete app, download app: same error. The support team the put a ‚Äútrace‚Äù on my account supposedly. No error for 2 was. Then the error started back up, so I went back through the above steps, as advised by support who had a ‚Äútrace‚Äù on my account. None of the fixes worked, and the ‚Äútrace‚Äù apparently means nothing. Support then advised that I need to delete the app, and connect to my computer to sync my iTunes, then download the app...blah blah blah blah....Guess what? None of that crap worked either!!! Huge waste of time and effort! I fail to understand how iTunes is at fault, but pandora surely isn‚Äôt going to solve any problems, let alone take responsibility and fix their app. No no no...instead they are busy creating ridiculous processes that fix nothing, and useless updates. Great job pandora! The Best Playlists I‚Äôve been using Pandora since 2003 or 2004 and it has introduced me to so many new artists that I have proudly shared with friends through the years. No longer in Denial I‚Äôve been in denial over the functionality of Pandora for over a year now. After years of free listening with manageable ads I found that the number, frequency and length of ads went up exponentially about a year ago. So I decided to upgrade.  Commercial free and offline listening were big selling points to me. However it‚Äôs not really commercial free is it? I would have to play an ad to replay a song and sometimes even to skip. And don‚Äôt get me started on the offline listening feature. I am a commuter and am often on the subways and I find that not only do I have to have turned on the offline listening option before I‚Äôm underground but I only have a selection of maybe a dozen songs in that playlist. If I don‚Äôt switch to the offline listening option before I‚Äôm out of range there is no offline listening for me at all. Instead I watch as Pandora skips and buffers through dozens of songs as I listen to the complaints of commuters around me. I can‚Äôt honestly note a praiseworthy aspect of Pandora right now and since I‚Äôve canceled my subscription I have such a sense of alleviation. I am no longer wasting money or energy over an app that doesn‚Äôt work.

Veronica Andrade Pandora filled my summer with exquisite songs and I found a lot of new music to listen to. I enjoyed the pleasant slow walks with quick steps in between running to soft calming tunes. I enjoyed the late night parties to Spanish music. I enjoyed the summer mornings spent playing basketball with my ball dribbling to the beat of drums. I could not put it into better words, but I felt like I was in love every single day in July and August. I cannot believe music has come this far. I cannot even trace where I found all such great music. The world definitely does not deserve Pandora because it gives more than we give back. I don't even have a favorite song. Because of all the great music Pandora has to offer. Rather I have a myriad of favorite songs ranging from R&B, pop, classic rock and romantic music. With artists like American Authors, OneRepublic, Pink, Daft Punk, and Taylor Swift. And favorite movie soundtracks like Paper Towns, Love Story, and Valerian. Love, yours truly, and number one listener: Veronica Andrade

Needs an update for modern devices Pandora needs an update for a stand alone app compatible with the Apple Watch Series 3 Cellular. Terrible for podcasts A feature of pandora has been for as long as I can remember to skip to another song when a song takes too long to buffer. Although annoying enough on its own, when it occurs during podcast listening it's infuriating. The app skips the remainder of what you are listening to and then LISTS IT AS LISTENED TO. Which means requiring the listener to find that podcast in an incredibly non user friendly search function, then try to remember approximately where they got interrupted, then try to get the podcast to play from that point without buffer skipping again. This is annoying enough but becomes impossible to do safely while driving, the main time that I listen to podcasts.

Updated: Now Terrible Is very likely I‚Äôm going to cancel my subscription after the last few updates. That‚Äôs after being a paying customer for years and years. Now... it‚Äôs basically useless. It‚Äôs bad. Who made this decision? You should seriously question your product management and design leadership if they‚Äôre making decisions like this that will materially impact your business.

Ads and Pandora I have been using Pandora for so many years as a free app. I have also had premium for 3 months. I have always appreciated the adds were local and reasonably not disruptive to flow. Recently I have been annoyed by the adds. One is piercing repeated sounds at the intro. My recent one is political irritation. We just got bands like Tool to be on Pandora. Yay. A group that won‚Äôt sell out but honors the digital age. Then I see an add for chick fillet. A group which publicly announced plans for discrimination being financially backed. In a Trump era this feels like a slap to the face from Pandora. We have a right to support our values with our money. We have an obligation to use our time, talent, & tools to make our world a place worth fighting for. Playlist have always been a way to control the flow and boy do I want them back. I am currently unable to justify my want.

Unintuitive I like the music aspect of the app, but it needs an overhaul in the user/ control aspect.  The controls are not user friendly. For instance, the repeat button is next to the thumbs down button; it‚Äôs too easy to accidentally bump the thumbs down. Chances are if you want to hear a song again it should be next to the thumbs up button so that if you accidentally bump it it‚Äôs all good. The thumbs down button should be on its own to prevent unintentional dislikes. Also, many of us are too poor or stingy to buy and Apple Watch and still run with our phones. The controls are so little that it makes liking, disliking, or repeating a song difficult while running. Perhaps they could include a ‚Äúrunning mode‚Äù with big buttons instead of the tiny ones they have at the bottom of the screen.  None of these things would be that hard to implement but would be a big improvement on the user experience.

Tricked into purchasing premium through iPhone app A pop-up will periodically appear offering to upgrade to premium, with a ‚Äúnot now‚Äù option.  I am fine with the ad-based experience and have no interest in purchasing the premium version.  I usually try to click ‚Äúnot now‚Äù but it‚Äôs become increasingly difficult because when the pop-up appears, after a lag it moves down, so that the ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù option is where the ‚Äúnot now‚Äù option used to be. Going downhill Pandora has always been, and still is, my favorite streaming music app.  I have even had paid subscriptions on and off over the years. Make sure you don‚Äôt thumbs up or down... Pandora is pretty solid. Then you hear a song that you really like or hear a song a thousand times and you hit that thumbs up or down button. You might end up with a Fiona Apple station that plays nothing but EDM and a Smashing Pumpkins that‚Äôs all jazz based on a few up or downvotes. It‚Äôs wacky. Pandora is nice for the first couple months until all of the stations become a mess or get repetitive.

Opportunistic I recently purchased a new car, the first with CarPlay!  Yay me.   After driving my car for a few days, I noticed that Pandora would randomly start playing without me opening the app.   This would happen when I was plugged in to the USB port as I denied the app access via blue tooth.   In an effort to fix the problem I attempted to find a way to disable auto launch -  no such luck.  Yes I found directions on HOW to do  this by be  but my updated app removed the ability to complete said task.   Next I tried removing the app from CarPlay while leaving the original on my iPhone.  Nope - even though I would immediately swipe up and to the right to close the app,  it would immediately turn itself back on- overriding whatever app or radio station I was currently listening too.  This became so annoying that I finally deleted Pandora completely from my iPhone.  Good riddance!

author_name: How many people have mr handy
review_body: A very helpful suggestion So I was in the shower, listening to Pandora (as I always do), and 3 songs, in a row, played that were in my music library. I only got Pandora in order to hear music that‚Äôs NOT in my library while I‚Äôm showering. So I had an idea that you should include in an update. A menu will pop up, asking you for permission to scan your music library, and once it‚Äôs done, it will exclude those songs from the songs that play on the application, regardless of the genre or artist. Other than that, great app. Highly recommend

Gets crappier every year I‚Äôve had pandora for YEARS, however, they get worse every year! More and more ads every year, the ads that they play are the most annoying things ever. If they‚Äôre trying to sell something, they‚Äôre not doing a good job. They‚Äôre not comedic, entertaining, and they make me hate the company. I‚Äôve also noticed, if you listen to pandora long enough it‚Äôll even start playing the same songs you already heard some hour prior. It also takes up too much battery power and will restart my phone and/or laptop. The last two years I‚Äôve listened to more radio than pandora, and pandora was supposed to be the alternative to avoid crappy/long commercials.
hi lol The app is pretty great! I just have a few complaints:

Singers I gather that the more likes I give to a singer the more of his/her songs will be played. I open the app and that stupid dog video plays over and over. I actually scream when I see a dog picture on Google search. üòï Forget Trump-Russia what about Pandora-Dog food. It is the only explanation I have for this.

Love my music Pandora is nice because you can pick an artist or genre that you want and it will play that music and music similar to it. And if you like something, it will play more if it. If you dislike something it will not play it anymore. The more you like the more customized the station is. And thumbprint radio is nice to play when you just want to play whatever from all the songs you‚Äôve liked.

Pandora ‚ÄúDoes it Right‚Äù Pandora is absolutely hands down the best music streaming source on the internet.  Today I often tell military personnel ready to deploy to take their Pandora with them.  Selecting the type of music you like, can really get you through some stressful situations.  And listening to radio stations from your hometown area give you the feeling of having a part of home with you. I‚Äôm a retired military veteran and it worked for me. Mr. Tim Westergren thank you!  Your Pandora vision is ‚Äúrock solid‚Äù

Pandora Premium Session Bug My ONLY issue with it is this recent bug that causes my Pandora Premium Session to glitch and messes up my music before I can activate it. Like, I‚Äôll go to activate my session and my Pandora crashes instantly. My phone is an IPhone 7 plus and is updated to the 11.2.6 version. I also have more than enough space on my device if that plays a factor and my internet is great. I love this app whole-heartedly and without a doubt. I stopped using all my other music apps after I found this one. Please, please fix this or if it‚Äôs specific to my phons, let me know.
Nice Intuitive Supply of Music Besides the random catches when the app will refuse to work about 3 times a year, this is an excellent source for music.

Chiropractic office music Love it! Love my pandora music especially my thumbs up have been grouped together! I love that I can select stations to match with patients that come in. From Michael Buble for some seniors to Billie Eilish for the college girls and RAI sounds for the yoga instructors that come in to get checked!!! It‚Äôs great and is wonderful when I‚Äôm working with people or by myself. Thank you! Plus on holidays my family line up our favorites and dance and eat making beautiful memories with pandora music! We play music to match the type of food we are cooking!!!!üíï

Fed up with bugs I‚Äôve been a premium subscriber for almost a decade, and One for a few months, but now I‚Äôm fed up with a terrible app. Every time I open the app now I‚Äôm forced to restart, then a few songs later, restart again. It tells me the wrong song by the wrong artist in the wrong playlist is playing sometimes, and then won‚Äôt skip to fix the issue. If I was playing a playlist and want to continue after having to restart? Nope, back to the beginning.

‚ÄúUnlimited skips‚Äù on paid premium is false advertising I use two music apps because they both serve their purposes, Pandora being one of them, but am now considering dropping Pandora. I have been a Premium paying member for a while and was a super fan until I tried to skip a song and this popped up: ‚Äúdue to licensing restrictions, this song can‚Äôt be skipped right now‚Äù, which I had never experienced before. Clearly the statement ‚Äúunlimited skips‚Äù is not as advertised, which is one major reason I‚Äôm paying for premium!!! No one likes to be lied to Pandora, especially not your customers who used to be your best word of mouth advocates.

Could be better I think pandora is pretty cool. I have a Taylor Swift radio, a broadway radio and I even have a kids bop (kids radio ) for my younger sister who is 7. One day I had it playing for our ‚Äútea party‚Äù and I like it tike that came on and it had a lot of bad words so now my sister and mom are both mad at me for playing a song with bad words in it . My point is that songs that you create the station for never comes on. Another thing is limited skips I just think that makes the app annoying but other than that good game

Connect to WiFi for ‚Äúoff line‚Äù listening I got pandora plus for off line music because my daily commute has areas where Cellular service is not available. The $5.38 I paid for two months did absolutely nothing in the off line areas, the app just said connect to WiFi. At the least I‚Äôm dissatisfied and wish I could have gotten my money back. The app has a great set up but it‚Äôs just ten times easier to buy music off the App Store I actually like. I hope the development team see‚Äôs this review and fixes it if other people are having the same problem. Note my phone is a original iPhone 6 and that might be the issue, I hope this review helps someone thanks for reading.

great app, but..... After using the app for a very long time, I was offered a free trial of 30 days for an in app upgrade to Pandora Plus.  The terms and conditions stayed very clearly that there would be no charge made until the trip expired unless it was cancelled more than 24 hours prior to trial end.....I was billed immediately, cancelled the subscription immediately (literally within minutes), and refused a refund of the charge that was not supposed to occur for 30 days......so much for that free trial üò§ü§Ø

Could be better Good if you‚Äôre tired of the radio. Will repeat songs after a bit. Don‚Äôt like how if i stop listening for a few minutes it restarts my station/playlist from the beginning. It never continues where I left off. Very annoying. I do pay for the service since I don‚Äôt want to hear commercials and like not being limited to how many songs I can skip. The user interface could be better. Playlists, songs, thumbs are scattered all over and constantly change positions. Also not a fan of them making playlists for me of songs i might like, and usually don‚Äôt like, I can do that on my own.

It‚Äôs pretty good Hey I just wanted you know what you want me when I can come over for a little while I‚Äôll come over at the school I‚Äôll let you know what time you get here I can get it to me I‚Äôll come over and hang with him and I‚Äôll get it done I‚Äôll text him and let him talk with him and I‚Äôll let you know when I‚Äôm home in a little while I am not really sure I‚Äôll text him when I‚Äôm home I‚Äôll let you know what I‚Äôm going through and I know you know when you come get to me I‚Äôll let you know what I‚Äôm going through to get you know when I get to work.

author_name: Being A Rater Is My Job!
review_body: I LOVE Pandora! But there are a couple things I would change. First there should be NO ads and also if you put on a radio like Arianna Grande radio,(I LOVE Arianna Grande!‚ù§Ô∏è) You should ONLY be able to listen to Arianna Grand and not other songs and then once we listen to all the Arianna Grande songs there could be a little nonfiction so we could know we listened to all the Arianna Grande songs and then we could go onto another radio like Bruno Mars(I also LOVE Bruno Mars‚ù§Ô∏è) These are all the things I would change about Pandora other then that I give Pandora 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è‚Äôs

Unique, Even Life Changing I love Pandora SO much ...   it is such a unique resource and inspires so much creativity. I credit the bulk of the development of my love of music to Pandora. It opened my ears and eyes to so many different types of music, each resonating with me in a different way. Listening to Pandora helps my heart talk ...   I love it so much. Thank you.

Reduced sound quality. Used to be good. So sad. Wow. Some times an App has a good thing going. Then someone up high in the ranks has an idea. Maybe like, ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs reduce the sound quality of the songs people really love. They won‚Äôt notice it. They really don‚Äôt listen anyway. Its just background for them. We can reduce the amount of information streamed and save millions. Yes, all at the expense of the listener, but who cares. We have that yacht and our tropical vacation to support.‚Äù Yep. I am a bit frustrated. Yep. My review contains a measure of rant.

Terrible recent update I‚Äôve been using pandora for years, I prefer it to anything else. But with the new update, the songs will stop a couple seconds in, the whole app will freeze and I‚Äôll have to shut it down and reopen it, and the second my screen locks or I open another app, the music stops again. When I go back to Pandora to press play again, the app is frozen and I need to go through the whole process over again.

Doesn‚Äôt work properly anymore On an iPhone 8 - Within the last few weeks when I open the app it launches ok, but when I try to exit the app to the main screen to perform another task or launch another app, the music stops the second I leave the app screen. It also stops playing when my phones screen dims to black while not in use for more than 30 seconds.

Repetitive So let me start by saying music is life. I‚Äôm constantly listening to it. Last summer I decided to get pandora premium and enjoy its perks. That was a mistake. It was all great for a few months but now it will only play the same songs over and over again. I have so many different stations but I always hear the same music on them. Also, some stations seem to play the same songs in the same order every time I listen to them. I‚Äôm canceling premium to see if it goes back to the pandora I used to love. If this is fixed I could see myself being a customer again but until then I‚Äôll deal with the commercials as the lack of variety isn‚Äôt worth the money.

Clutch Music! I really appreciate Pandora! They have consistently offered the best music at no cost to listeners for many years! I‚Äôve had my account for at least 7 years now. I call them ‚Äúclutch music‚Äù because i have always had difficulties sleeping, and I rely on them to help me fall asleep. They finally stopped sending me the, ‚ÄúAre you still listening? We don‚Äôt pay to play to an empty room‚Äù warnings! I listen to the best of Gospel 85% of the time, General R&B 8% of the time, relaxing sounds 2% of the time, and guilty pleasure (cough, Trey Songz station) 5% of the time! Haha

Extremely frustrated I have been paying for pandora premium for over a year, and its incredibly frustrating. When i switch from online to offline to get in my car, it doesn‚Äôt transfer, two songs in it makes the offline chime, then stops all music. I have to close and reopen my pandora three times and turn off my wifi search for it to finally work properly, and even then it doesn‚Äôt. Then, when I‚Äôm getting out of my car, pause the music and close the app, it starts playing again, just randomly and the app isn't even open. So i reopen the app, pause the music close it again, and it still is playing. I have to restart my phone every time for this. This is the second time I‚Äôve brought it up.

The Most Music Has Even Been!! I once saw my Granny turn completely white, when she heard me singing a song off of my new 8 Track, back N the ‚Äò70‚Äôs.  It had been a fav of her mother born, over a 100 years earlier.  Gran freaked!  It turned out that I shared a love 4 many of the very songs great-grandma used 2 sing & play.   Once radio made it into those isolated, rural log cabins, great-grandmas fiddle found a place on the shelf.

Go home pandora, you‚Äôre drunk. There are some problems with the algorithm I think... I say this because when I am listening to the pentatonix station I am wanting to hear a capela but then fall out boy shows up. I like fall out boy but not when I‚Äôm in the mood for a capela. Also, the ads that interrupt mid-song need to stop. I don‚Äôt have pandora premium and I understand that means I am subject to ads. However, when they interrupt my music in the middle of a song that is extremely irritating.

AMAZING!! I love pandora. I love how they have a great station variety, how they only play thumbs upped songs, and once in a while play some new songs. And this is coming from a nine year old who‚Äôs obsessed with music. Also I personally love country music and once I started listening to raelynn radio on Pandora I started finding new country artists like Kealsa Ballerini, Danielle Bradberry, Kane brown, Maddie and Tae, and so much more. I‚Äôm actually listening to it right now. So if you haven‚Äôt downloaded pandora you should do it now and listen to all your fav. songs.

Hi Pandora is great could be better if you could make your own playlists I don‚Äôt know if you can with premium pandora but with the regular you can‚Äôt do that is a bit stressful because sometimes songs that I don‚Äôt like come on and I ran out of skips or due to licensing restrictions the song can‚Äôt be skipped right now whatever the reason for not being able to skip then you have to watch an add to get out of the station also Why Don‚Äôt We should be on more stations and so should The Vamps just saying.

Love it, but keeps restarting my phone I love Pandora, I discover so many new artists and grow my music library every time I stream for longer than 20 minutes. However, of late, after having the app stream a couple of songs, my phone restart. I don't lose any progress on anything and reopening the app starts off the song I had been listening to from the point my phone restarted. The whole "phone restarting after a couple of songs" thing is starting to get really old. Maybe look into this for me and others who might be facing this issue?

Great!!! But... This app works really well and the music choices are great! I really like the variety of different songs in each station and I like how they sometimes replay after a while. I also like how it's all free! I don't like how some unrelated songs just randomly come on though. It's kinda annoying. I also think that, the   ads are really annoying and repetitive. My suggestion is to only put one ad after a few songs instead of putting 1 or 2 ads after, about 2-3 songs. But other than that this app is amazing and I highly suggest it.

Alarm clock doesn't work unless u buy premium ? I've set my alarm clock several days in a row !!!! Left the app open and on the screen HOWEVER, it hasn't worked! It's probably because every time I open the app it asks if I want to switch to premium and I always press not now. Because I have before but not interestsd in paying . Anyways! I think it's cuz that annoying question every time that when I'm sleeping obviously I can't press later! And the app has been saying "this station is currently unavailable try another station." but I do and just press right back on the same one and it'll start working. Some kind of malfunction is going on ! Please fix it so I don't need to find another app!

Yes but... Okay so everyone likes the premise of Pandora, and yes, I enjoy that it‚Äôs free with fairly minimal commercials but if you can‚Äôt fix the crashing problem properly; that is, if you can‚Äôt stop the app from pausing itself, and the rebooting when I try to open it again, and the REPLAYING THE SAME SONG AGAIN, then I‚Äôll just go back to paying for SiriusXM on my phone. I do not want to listen to the same song three times because the app can‚Äôt manage to work for more than three minutes. I was concerned it was only me until I started complaining about it at work and my coworker said she was having the exact same problem. GET IT TOGETHER PANDORA.

Needs improvement Offline stations should be choosable not random or based on what pandora thinks I want to hear. Thumbprint radio needs improvement; still plays songs I never gave a thumbs up rating.

When it doesn't crash my phone, it's good I like the way pandora allows you to give a track a thumbs up, and then change it to a neutral or thumbs down later if you want. I like the algorithm they use to pick songs I might like, and the ads aren't too terrible. I really like being able to watch an ad and then get an hour of uninterrupted music.
Slowly Going Down Hill I have been using Pandora for over a decade now, and I think it is just plain sad to see the service degrading as it is.
What Have They Done with Station Seeding?! I‚Äôve been a Pandora user for several years, but now I‚Äôm going to have to reconsider its future role in my life.

Best Music Streaming BUT Buggs!!! I love Pandora, I have Premium and i love the music and the platform except for the fact that for about a week now the app has been super buggy with music stopping or buffering or pausing and the app even totally crashing. It‚Äôs super inconvenient mostly in the evenings when i try to listen to my playlists and relax after work.

Great app no amazing but... Pandora would not let me in and I tried restarting my iPod and that didn‚Äôt work so I deleted it and went to the App Store to get it again and it said unavailable app plz try again so a couple minutes later I tried again and it still didn‚Äôt work. Even tho pandora is amazing and it worked really well I just think they should help with that issue. Know the good stuff. Pandora is a really good music app and they have all types of song and music I suggest pandora to ppl who are looking for a app! Plz reapply so I can fix my problem Ps plz means please

AMAZINGGGGT but, Pandora is a fab app and it‚Äôs how I listen to most of my music and it‚Äôs just great!!! But I have to say there are adds a lot of adds and so if you want to listen to a certain exact song you have to listen to a add to listen to the song that you want to listen to and if you just type in the song you want then it just goes to that station not the real song so songs like it and guess what right know I am listening to Pandora some Christmas music hahah yes, and I‚Äôm listening to a add right know but over all I would really recommend pandora it‚Äôs a really good app!!!

I wish... I wish you would tailor your ads better to your stations.. I understand completely the need to play ads for a free version of this application but I am a first time user and solely downloaded this to try out lullaby stations for my 2 months old daughter.. I am extremely frustrated at the ads that play, not only are they much louder then the stations volume but the ads that have played have woke my daughter up every time they have come on because of the volume and content. One recently was an obnoxious ad that was about feminine pads for overnight use that including the sound of someone snoring, a baby crying and laughter.

Fine with ad frequency but bring back old version! As many other reviewers have mentioned, not being able to leave a station and come back to a different song playing on it later (as opposed to the song starting right where you left off when you switched stations) is s terrible update. Sometimes you don‚Äôt want to skip / thumb-down a song and have that information go into your playlist algorithm; you simply are tired of it *for the time being.* However, this new update doesn‚Äôt allow you to ‚Äúsoft skip‚Äù in cases like this. Please revert Pandora back to the way it was before this update. I‚Äôm even fine with the increased # of ads!

What happened to shuffle? Pandora has always been and will likely continue to be my go to app for music streaming.  It‚Äôs been very easy to set up a station and the variety has been very good over the number of years I‚Äôve been a user and subscriber.

I don‚Äôt like people Pandora is my favorite way to find new music. Sometimes my friends try to recommend music that I haven‚Äôt heard before and then I feel obligated to tell them how their music gives me the sensation of night crawlers and centipedes burrowing in my ear holes. I love my friends but they shouldn‚Äôt recommend music or reproduce. I have trouble maintaining relationships. Pandora constantly rejuvenates my music library without getting offended when I do not enjoy a new song. Thanks Pandora, who needs human companionship anyway?

LOVE IT!! I LOVE Pandora!! I have been skipping around with different ways of playing music, and Pandora is the best if you are looking to play music for free! I am always able to discover new songs and I just love how spread out the songs are. Your favourite songs play through out and you are able to find out new amazing songs that you haven‚Äôt ever even heard of that are related to your station. Pandora is just amazing, and I want to thank you guys so much for letting me have such a great experience with music! Love you guys!!!

Carplay issues Trying to use pandora on gmc carplay is very frustrating with iphone x. If you try to use from infotainment screen in gmc it launches but wont play anything because on your phone that ad pops up with the button that says skip to pandora. You have to unlock the phone and click the button. Not a very safe setup especially when the goal of carplay is to make driving safer based on the theory your not getting on the phone itself. The other issue is once it is playing a song, if you skip the song, there is then a delay in playing the next song because  the screen changes back to the full station list then back to the new song, not a huge delay but still far from working like it should.

Loving it!!! I am LOVING pandora! It is the perfect app for any music that you want to play and better yet, for free! All you do to have to listen is type in a song and watch a commercial and then you can play that song and many more with no more commercials for like an hour! It‚Äôs amazing! You can also create playlists and stations where you can listen to your favorite music plus recommended hits that you‚Äôll love! I‚Äôm serious about this review it‚Äôs amazing and I was not payed to do this review I‚Äôm just telling the truth about it!

Almost I‚Äôve had Premium for years now and Love it for the most part except the recent Update Brought a WAZE add banner that pops up at the top of the screen that you gotta clear it off EVERY time you open the app. I pay for premium to get all the music I want, thus it‚Äôs ridiculous that I still get this advertisement. Also so many great songs are restricted due to licensing or unavailable to even play when the song used to be fine and could be played. Also when I download music to take offline it works absolutely fine but the moment I restart my phone the app erases all my downloaded music.

No go for the iwatch Purchased the monthly service because it is the only music streaming provider other than iTunes for the iWatch. I recently upgraded my phone to the iPhone X and now no songs will load from Pandora onto my iWatch. The whole reason to use your service is to have music from the watch while running while away from my phone, if the music doesn‚Äôt load or there is no way to chose what songs or playlists should go onto the watch it serves no purpose. Frustrating. I‚Äôm going to wait a month to see if the app updates and than drop because if I can‚Äôt play music without the phone nearby I don‚Äôt need the service. Otherwise the music is great. Thanks

Good songs, but some complaints When I create a playlist I expect to hear from that artist or that song, but I only hear songs similar to it. When i open the app to skip, see the album cover, read background or whatever there is an ad and I close it, but another one pops up! It happens about 3 times in a row. It's annoying and I always accidentally click the ad. But all in all it's a good app. Great songs, unlimited stations, everything's fine except a couple small things that I could fix by upgrading. I guess that's how business works üòÖ

Tim I love Pandora, it is a great way to listen to the music I love. I think it would be nice to have a station in each genre that plays the new hits so that you can load that station and add your selections to your normal play lists. That would be better than random new music playing on your selected thumbs lists. All in all Pandora has been great! Thank you for all your work in keeping up this software a good company wants to know how their guests are feeling and makes changes to accommodate the reasonable requests of their patrons.

Controls Often Fail I love the free music and the commercials are totally fine. However, the controls are buggy. Often, I have to force quit and re launch the app two or three times to get the ‚Äúplay‚Äù button to work. Once playing, the ‚Äúpause‚Äù button will not work. The only way I can get the music to stop is to force quit the app again. Then it stops. Because of this using it in the car through Apple CarPlay isn‚Äôt viable. Using the app on my phone playing through speakers has the same result. Force quitting to make the app respond. Please fix ASAP as Pandora is my go-to for streaming at home and in the car. Please!

Broken!!! I‚Äôve been a loyal pandora user for a long time. I pay for pandora one to skip the ads and I use it all the time while I work/drive. As of a week or more ago the app has completely stopped working correctly and I‚Äôve seen zero updates to fix it.

FIX THE CRASHES. Overall, I really enjoy Pandora. I‚Äôm cheap so I just use the free version and deal with the annoying ads(which are incredibly annoying, but like I said I‚Äôm cheap so I realize it‚Äôs my choice to deal with it). However, lately it‚Äôs been crashing at least once during every listening period. It‚Äôs getting to the point where I‚Äôm just done with it and probably going to have to see what else is out there. Every time they come out with a new update it claims to address the issues with the crashing and yet nothing has been done, if anything it crashes more often for me now. Pandora, FIX THIS ISSUE.

Please stop asking me to upgrade I pay for Pandora, I have for years. I really like the app, all the new music I've been introduced to, etc. What I really dislike is the relentless pop up trying to get me to upgrade to Pandora Premium. STOP, I'm happy, leave me alone. It makes me want to cancel the service. Annoying as heck I can't turn off Pandora's advertisements of itself. I pay for no ads, turn off your ads too! 5 stars when you stop. Hey, only asked me 7 times today... <sigh> I use to love Pandora, now I hate it.

What happened? I've been a very happy user of Pandora for years now, but suddenly the app won't open. Says it can't connect and there's no problem with my device or internet connection. This is very upsetting as I have a 6 year old daughter that one played a "lullaby" station during bath and getting ready for bed since she was a few weeks old. Suddenly not being able to access this is very upsetting and has totally thrown our routine off, which is a huge deal for a kid with autism. I have trusted this app for years and I've never had a problem until the past few weeks. Zero access, no problem with my devices or internet connection, what gives??? I'm not happy to have to try other streaming music apps all of a sudden.

Happy customer I just downloaded SiriusXM, because my father and a few friends have it and seem to like it. However, I can‚Äôt seem to find a huge selection of choices, in fact it has very little. And I don‚Äôt like any of what they do offer.

Why why why I upgraded to pandora platinum, and now it only plays the songs I have thumbed up on my stations. I did not thumb up a lot of songs because I just listen throughout the day and I don‚Äôt set and hold my phone at work. So I‚Äôm listening to the same songs over and over. üò° You can only change the playlists on platinum not the stations. And why did you take away the I‚Äôm tired of this track option??? I‚Äôm about to cancel. I only wanted to have no commercials, unlimited skips, ability to make playlists, and listen offline. Why was that so hard. You didn‚Äôt have to change all this other stuff!!!

Getting better in 2020 I‚Äôm a a Pandora user since they first launched as just the Music Genome project. Up through 2019 the app was updated but often took odd turns like adding podcasts before fixing long standing CarPlay bugs. However they‚Äôve lately launched a user feedback community and in late 2019 and early 2020 have really fixed CarPlay, added station personalization, and revamped Apple Watch function. If they keep on this trajectory they could really eat away at the other music apps. Keep up this progress.

Going downhill I can tell the issue of having to close and reopen isn't new, but I've just had something happen to me that I haven't seen before. I skipped a song and the next song... was the same song. I was then out of skips, very frustrating. Needs many bug fixes. Note: I'm using a brand new iPhone 7+.

DO NOT UPDATE!!! do not update to the most recent version. if you use pandora on your phone with carplay in your car DO NOT UPDATE because it will not work. they did it again messing up the control buttons on the phone screen. usually when i plug my phone to my car via usb pandora will automatically come on and play the last song i was listening to. but with the recent update it does not work anymore and you cannot control pandora from the iphone home control center. this is the second time they did this. they fixed it with the last update but with this recent update it reverted back to not working again. so if you use pandora carplay the i recommend not updating or you will regret it.

Love it Pandora has perfected and continues to perfect my thumbprint on all my stations and always plays music that is just what I am looking to hear. Thank you for the excellent service pandora radio. I love the ability to listen to my music during flights and have the music I love even when I have no connection. I am always customizing my stations and am always happy to hear all the suggested songs based on my virtual thumbprint. Pandora is by far one of my favorite and most used apps on my phone.

GREAT! Also for kids! This is great! It has a good deal of watching a 15 second add for an hour of uninterrupted listening and no adds for that hour. I don‚Äôt like the members thing, where you get uninterrupted listening ONLY if you are willing to pay like $30 each month! But other than that, it‚Äôs a great app. Especially when you‚Äôre kids are wanting to listen to music but you don‚Äôt want them to watch the video clips, this is great for them to listen to music without having to watch the video clips.

Sound drops when using Bluetooth or airplay through eeros I wanted to give feedback that I noticed that pandora has been dropping the sound every 20 minutes which is really annoying when using Bluetooth or airplay. You can restart it but when we are in the pool this is a problem to get out very time it happens. I didn‚Äôt have this problem when I had my Netgear router only when we changed to eeros mesh network but it does not happen with Apple Music so we have determined it is not eeros or the receiver. It has to be pandora by process of elimination. I don‚Äôt know if pandora made changes to their app since July but it is a problem now and we will be changing to Apple Music.

So close to 5 stars... I use the free version of Pandora & I‚Äôm overall satisfied with it. The only feature it needs to make it a 5-star app would be the ability to direct songs to a different playlist. I have a number of playlists I listen to in different settings. Often, a song will play on one playlist and I‚Äôll think, ‚ÄúThis is a great song, but it doesn‚Äôt exactly fit with my current mood/setting. Politicizing Music I have been a long time user of Pandora, with over five years of service across many devices. I cannot in good faith support an application which uses its platform to push a political agenda instead of providing the service I use it for. So until such adds are removed I will no longer be using this program. To all who find this trend of ridiculous politicizing unacceptable look for other music apps than this one. I for one will be using Sirius radio now.

Pandora‚Äôs ‚Äúspecialization‚Äù is worse than spotify‚Äôs side perks. Pandora‚Äôs main function is radio stations based on the given song, artist, album, etc. But it simply is a terrible system. Some all caps but this all FACTS Low key.... but not even low key STRAIGHT FACTS, PANDORA CAPS ALL no questions asked. No Cap. review_body: Dislike problem Overall I love pandora. It‚Äôs amazing and as long as you kind of shape your stations to what you want, it works great! Does not work on iPhone when plugged into car The app displays an accessory screen when you plug your iPhone into your car which it will not let you select any of your stations or songs. You HAVE to use Bluetooth only when connecting it to your car. The help guide online says to to the advanced menu and disable CarPlay which is not in the menu anymore. If you want to listen to any music when plugged into your car, you need to unplug select the station and then plug it back in. Additionally, if you want to change the station, you HAVE to unplug, change the station, and plug it back in. Once plugged in, the accessory screen displays and you can‚Äôt navigate away from it. This is a major bug.
All Down Hill from Here Pandora has been my go-to music app for years and it has been great!

review_body: Please fix! I love using Pandora for my music, but all of a sudden today, it stopped working on my phone. At first when I opened the app, it said I had poor connection. author_name: Rabid mother of twins in Ohio
review_body: Pandora review I think Pandora is awesome. I have a hard time with remembering artist and their song names. On Pandora I don‚Äôt have any problem finding music that I love. Every genre. Every song. Every everything!!

Not letting me play playlists and not letting me skip Everytime i go to skip a song or play my playlists it says ‚Äúcontent r/n‚Äù and then the app freezes. I then have to exit out the app then back in. And when i got to do the same action it gives the same message and its making me very upset. Im close to just deleting Pandora if this keeps up.

Great app, but one issue This is great but recently, even if I‚Äôm connected to fully functioning WiFi, sometimes when I open the app, the buffering screen appears for a while and no music plays until I restart the app (sometimes twice). But otherwise great user interface.

Needs work I love pandora, but every time I change a song, the app ends up crashing. I have to delete the app and re download it every time it happens. It just needs an update to fix that bug. Please do an update on the app.

My review I love the fact that it gives you an option to listen to the specific song you want to listen to and plays songs similar to that ! I also like that the music topics and songs they play are really good and cool.

I Love this App I have been a Pandora user for at least 8 years. I learned how to rate music and create channels designed for me. I can listen for 11 hours strait while driving to my next video shoot never here a song a don‚Äôt like.

Love it In use this app a lot. I love all the songs it plays for me!! In fact, sometimes I end up staying up all night because I can‚Äôt stop listening to music. I say ‚ÄúOh just one more song!‚Äù, but then another good one comes on. Totally recommend!

Too many ads I understand the need for ads but every few songs is too much. Should make the interactive ads for an hour free more prevalent. Great music algorithm 90% of the time though. The other 10% I just use another device included in my 2-day shipping program.

Luvin it! I am loving now that when I thumbs up my favorite songs, that  Pandora is playing more of my favorites, plus adding new songs to the mix. This is an awesome way to learn new music that is out there and enjoy my favorites. Thank you Pandora üé∂

It had slow recovery and I just tired. These are 2 routes that I take often, I just got tired of too many buffering episode..I‚Äôll stick with free one, so it doesn‚Äôt irritate me..

New update... no I updated the app and now this video keeps popping up after I X out of it. I also don‚Äôt like how mines not showing me the song unless I swipe up. I liked the older version better. I hope this gets fixed soon cause I actually like the fact that‚Äôs you can listen to music for a little before any ad pops up for 3 minutes.

Ads, ads, ads! Why so many ads? Pandora started out being a really awesome free music app. I have had a pandora account for a LONG time, but it seems like recently they‚Äôve started running LOTS of ads. Sometimes one after every single song. Sometimes two in a row. It‚Äôs SO frustrating. And I know it‚Äôs just because they now want me to pay for the ad-free version. The greed is so sad and disappointing.

User interface becoming unusable Dear Pandora: Your software is nothing I couldn‚Äôt do with conditional log-linear modeling refined with some creative Viterbi approximations. So I need to keep adding variety to the station I‚Äôm working on to pick up songs that I like while still thumbs downing the bad ones.  Put back the add variety button somewhere easily reachable. If AI was the future I wouldn‚Äôt have to manipulate it to work properly, get over yourselves and maybe pay your artists better.
